title: Warlock Spells
content: et with a bolt of lightning. Deal an additional 1~12 Lightning damage each turn by activating it. Inflicts Witch Bolt (10) 18m Concentration Blindness (Archfey Only) Lv 2 Necromancy ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Limit a foes sight range. It is easier to hit, and the creature will miss more often.Attack Rolls against it have Advantage and the foe attacks with Disadvantage.10 turns Range: 18mCON Save Calm Emotions (Archfey Only) Lv 2 Enchantment ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Humanoids can't be Charmed, Frig
